sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: Aqr Capital Management Holding Sells 195,806 Shares of IB Acquisition (NASDAQ:IBAC) Stock
feed.summary: Aqr Capital Management Holding significantly reduced its stake in IB Acquisition Corp. (NASDAQ:IBAC) by selling 195,806 shares for approximately $2.04 million, representing a 98.91% decrease in their ownership. Following this transaction and a previous sale, Aqr Capital now holds only 2,162 shares. The stock is currently rated "sell" by Weiss Ratings and has seen recent trading at $10.44.

feed.title: Major Shareholder Sells Big Chunk of IB Acquisition Corp. Stock! - TipRanks
feed.summary: AQR Capital Management Holdings, LLC, a major shareholder in IB Acquisition Corp. (IBAC), sold 195,806 shares for over $2 million on October 14, 2025. This sale follows the company's decision to extend its business combination deadline to March 28, 2026, which resulted in a significant reduction of funds in its Trust Account due to shareholder redemptions. These developments could impact the stock's future price movements and analyst targets.
